00004 using namespace std;
00005 
00006 int main(){
00007         string s;
00008         size_t pos = 0;
00009         string s1[11];
00010         cout << "Masukkan ekspresi matematika: ";
00011         cin >> s;
00012         int i = 0;
00013         cout << s<<endl;
00014         while(pos < s.length()){
00015                 if(s.find(" ")!= string::npos){
00016                         pos = s.find(" ");
00017                         s1[i] = s.substr(0,pos);
00018                         s.erase(0,pos+1);
00019                         cout << s1[i] << endl;
00020                         i++;
00021                 }
00022                 else if(s.find("+")!= string::npos){
00023                         pos = s.find("+");
00024                         s1[i] = s.substr(0,pos);
00025                         s.erase(0,pos+1);
00026                         cout << s1[i] << endl;
00027                         i++;
00028                 }
00029                 else if(s.find("-")!= string::npos){
00030                         pos = s.find("-");
00031                         s1[i] = s.substr(0,pos);
00032                         s.erase(0,pos+1);
00033                         cout << s1[i] << endl;
00034                         i++;
00035                 }
00036                 else if(s.find("*") != string::npos){
00037                         pos = s.find("*");
00038                         s1[i] = s.substr(0,pos);
00039                         s.erase(0,pos+1);
00040                         cout << s1[i] << endl;
00041                         i++;
00042                 }
00043                 else if(s.find("/") != string::npos){
00044                         pos = s.find("/");
00045                         s1[i] = s.substr(0,pos);
00046                         s.erase(0,pos+1);
00047                         cout << s1[i] << endl;
00048                         i++;
00049                 }
00050                 cout << "Pengulangan ke " << i << endl;
00051         }
00052         cout << s.substr(0,string::npos);
00053         return 0;
00054 }
